channel.title: Rape CAN be unfair to men
channel.description:
I was thinking about this.
What would happen if a woman raped you and you took her to court.
The jury is made of just common people, and it's not common for a woman to rape a guy.
What do YOU think would happen.
I think that you would be charged. I mean who hears of a woman raping a man, unless the man is a 6 yr old and the woman is an adult or something like that where it's obvious the man can't rape them. Basically, if you're raped by a woman and you're like teen+ you're screwed (unless you enjoyed it) because you have to decide between not saying anything, or saying something.
Some links you might want to see:
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20061010122126AAwUoeQ
Some guy gets raped, charged:
http://www.rediff.com/news/2004/jan/21guest.htm
Some guy gets raped, woman is charged:
http://www.aftenposten.no/english/local/article1027927.ece

item.title: Rape CAN be unfair to men
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Mopman:

There are more logical explanations for why it’s not common for a woman to rape a man.

And there are some logical explanations why a man could be rapped. Still not common though…

Examples:
like how the woman is of the amazon? Or she’s built better than a brick wall. Or the woman looked like this:

http://nynerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2006/03/body_builder_chick_6.jpg

My health class started talking about how a man could be raped, those were some funny explanations.

Read full topic
